Description:
Key Responsibilities:Utilize your Interior Design expertise to assist customers in making informed decisions about our products and services.
Demonstrate a solid understanding of the retail process and maintain a good knowledge of our product range.
Proficiently calculate prices, discounts, and any additional costs accurately.
Achieve the required sales targets and work towards improving sales ratios.
Cultivate strong communication skills to establish trust-based relationships with customers.
Greet and welcome customers into the store, offering guidance across different departments.
Provide customers with precise information about product features, pricing, and after-sales services.
Address customer inquiries and concerns promptly and professionally.
Effectively present comparisons between products, highlighting additional features and benefits to encourage purchase decisions.
Contribute to the preparation and implementation of various promotional activities to boost sales.
Oversee product recovery and replacement procedures as needed.
Collaborate with the retail sales team to deliver excellent customer service, particularly during peak business periods.
Keep customers informed about the latest offers, special discounts, and new product arrivals.
Regularly report customer feedback to the store manager, enabling the continuous improvement of services.
Stay updated on the latest products and services, maintaining a high level of product knowledge.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or a related field is preferred.
Proven experience in retail sales or customer service is an advantage.
Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to establish rapport with diverse customers.
Strong numerical and calculation skills to handle pricing and sales targets.
Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced retail environment.
Proficiency in utilizing various software applications, including point-of-sale systems.
Fluent in English (additional language skills are a plus).
Flexible schedule, including the ability to work weekends and holidays as needed.
